mapper.select: SELECT b1.id, b1.institution_name, b1.unified_social_credit_code, b1.legal_person, b1.contact_person, b1.contact_phone, b1.institution_level, b1.ownership_nature, b1.institution_type, b1.region, b1.detailed_address, b1.device_num, b2.institution_name as superior_institution FROM biz_institution_ext b1 INNER JOIN system_dept d1 ON b1.dept_id = d1.id LEFT JOIN biz_institution_ext b2 ON d1.parent_id = b2.dept_id WHERE b1.deleted = b'0' AND d1.deleted = b'0'
